TopicTitle: What games are you looking forward to this year/next year?

Articles.Content:
Hello all

I am wondering what games you all are looking forward to this year/next year.

My top 5 would be:

1. GTA 5

2. Need For Speed Rivals (looks awesome so far, will soon see if it will be awesome)

3. Forza 5 (because I am a massive Forza fan, although I won't be getting the xbone right off the bat)

4. F1 2013 (massive F1 fan)

5. F1 2014 (New 4 cylinder twin turbo engines coming in next year)

As far as I know for now, the only game I will be getting this year is GTA 5, I pre ordered the special edition of the game . I MAY get NFS Rivals this year, but I'd much prefer to wait until I get my new PC .
Rise of the Triad, Take On Mars. Both coming out this month, too.
Kerbal space program 0.21+

Rise of the Triad, Take On Mars. Both coming out this month, too.

I just looked at take on mars, it looks fun!

In no particular order:

Europa Universalis IV, Planetary Annihilation, KSP campaign mode.
I am looking forward to TES:Online if they don't mess it up

1) STAR CITIZEN ( i still have dried up drool on my face from being introduced to the dev of this game)

https://robertsspaceindustries.com/

2) GTA5

3) BF4

Rise of the Triad, Take On Mars. Both coming out this month, too.

I saw Take On Mars Trailer. I didn't know it was coming out this month though

1) Planetary Annihilation for sure. That game looks awesome.

2) Seven-G F/A-18 hopefully. Long wait but I'm kipping my hopes.

3) Mortal Kombat 9 for PC... Oh wait, it was released 5 days ago! Yeah!
I don't know if this counts, but I have been hoping for another game in the Portal series.

TES Online and MechWarrior Online.

Also, Sword Art Online

Unfortunately, console gaming doesn't appeal to me as much because Nintendo seems to have randomly ditched the Wii. I am hoping for continued work on Sinking Simulator, as well as of course new KSP updates.
Witcher 3 and Wasteland 2

Definitely not Grand Theft Auto 5, as Rockstars are douchers and aren't even making it for PC, you can't even preorder it for PC, or New gen consoles as a matter of fact, and the game looks, brown... I am looking forward to Saints Row 4, probably won't get it myself, but I'll watch some videos on youtube.
GTA V. And umm... nothing?

Definitely not Grand Theft Auto 5, as Rockstars are douchers and aren't even making it for PC

Although i agree with you about rockstar being a douche for not making the pc version release at the same date as the console version, it WILL come. I read somewhere that rockstar ANNOUNCED and released every pc version (not the 2d ones) after the console version was released.

It's funny that people are so overreacting. I can't see a reason for rockstar not to release it on pc. Just have some patience, it'll come.
Elite: Dangerous, although I'm taking the 'coming out this year / next year' on faith at this point.

Although i agree with you about rockstar being a douche for not making the pc version release at the same date as the console version, it WILL come. I read somewhere that rockstar ANNOUNCED and released every pc version (not the 2d ones) after the console version was released.

It's funny that people are so overreacting. I can't see a reason for rockstar not to release it on pc. Just have some patience, it'll come.

Red Dead Redemption still hasn't been ported over to PC.
The new command and conquer and total war Rome II.

The new Star Wars Battlefront. I'm so excited! I was a fan of the old ones.

Also, Watch_Dogs and MGS5.

Thief

(10chars)

1.GTA V

2. Starbound

3. KSP 0.21+

EDIT: 4.Take On Mars

Edited July 12, 2013 by gmpd2000
Age of Empires II: HD Edition.

1. GTA V

2. Battlefield 4

3. KSP Updates

4. ARMA 3

5.Battlefield Bad Company 3 (if they ever release it)

Doesn't anyone else want the new Star Wars Battlefront?

Man, that game was my childhood
